name: Nurx
0:
”Alexa open Nurx”
”Alexa, ask Nurx to remind me to take my birth control at 9 a.m.”
”Alexa, ask Nurx how the pill works”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nurx
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Nurx can remind you to take your birth control pill every day at a certain time, answer questions related to personal health and birth control, and teach you healthcare tips and interesting facts.

* Get birth control reminders *

Taking your birth control pill consistently is essential for pregnancy prevention. Now Nurx can give you a daily reminder through Alexa! For example say: “Alexa, tell Nurx to remind me to take my birth control every day at 8 AM.”

* Learn more about your health *

Nurx medical providers are experts in birth control, STI prevention and reproductive health. The Nurx skill allows you to learn more about your body, birth control and how to stay healthy. Make it a habit to ask Alexa for healthcare tips and facts from the experts at Nurx. Say, "Alexa, ask Nurx how the pill works" or "Alexa, ask Nurx for a healthcare fun fact."

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
